remarks: Commutatitivity of join operation.  Frequently-used special case of ~ latjcom for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2012.)
statement:
hlatjcom.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatjcom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatjcom $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( Y .\/ X ) ) $.
